name: HighSchool Ninja Girls
description:
Kaoru finds herself surrounded by undead creatures while going to her highschool while she is meet Erin, the succubus demon. And, oh no! Her friends has turned into zombies! She has no other choicebut to wipe out the evil succubus classmates that have turned into walking dead, who were once her friends.

Seven high school girls, in a school of the dead, and a dead lord known only as Demon – welcome to one of the schoolgirls rage beat em up games. Arm yourself with sword, katana, and sexy costumes to do highschool battle through burst tales of the unknown zombie infested highschool renewal streets to bring order of the dead school. Beat up Slender guys, evil teacher, and japanese ninja to become hot as hell – High School Ninja Girls Battle is the anime sword fighting game of beat-‘em-ups!

Kaoru can do some sword fighting games! Trapped in the cemetery, haunted school, or horror hospitals surrounded by mortal enemies and immortal ghost. If you love beach splash sword fighting girls, you're going to love this anime high school girl fighting game because its fun to play as shinovi and you'll have some horror as you join the zombie vs ninja girls battle as one of the highschool ninja girls assassin.

FEATURES:

- Playing as 7 different ninja girls
- Use ninjutsu skills and sword fighting style to destroy enemies!
- Collect sexy costumes for your girls, or if you can beat the game several times, you can wear no costume at all!
- 5 Different mode, Story, Arcade, Zombie, Swimming or Beach on high school ninja girls games!
